duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support for the Temporal Analysis of Products (TAP) Reactor System.
Support the servicing of laboratory instrumentation, diagnostics, repair, replacement, and fabrication of components.
Troubleshoot lab-scale electronics and make measurements like conductivity, current, voltage, and resistance.
Fabricate, test, and repair parts and equipment under the direction of the master technician and/or principal investigator.
Assist in the setup, maintenance, and repair TAP instrumentation and related systems.
Contribute to metalworking projects from planning and fabrication through assembly, inspection, and testing.

education_certification.credential: High School degree plus 1-4+ years work experience in machining (lathe and mill), welding, and/or operation and maintenance of electronic equipment.
